name: OneBit PacMan (Playdate)
description:
A  new revision of the Arcade classic.

Including:

  • 12 mazes
  • One bit handmade graphics
  • Selectable difficulty
  • High score saving
  • Collectable powerups:
    • Extra life
    • Invulnerability
    • Kill all ghosts
    • Freeze ghosts
    • Slow ghosts
    • Shoot!

This game is heavily based on Edgar M. Vigdal's Commodore Amiga Deluxe PacMan game, for me the best version of PacMan ever made. There are some maps in this game inspired by this great version.

I've added a faster version (50fps). It's faster and harder than the original one (30fps).

Coded in LUA using PlayDate SDK by Oscar BraindeaD, 2022
